name: Shane STILL likes to Shoot
description:
Shane is comming back in the long awaited sequel. The classic top down arcade shooter has some new features this time!
  • A revamped and polished version of the original game
  • An all new Wave mode with new foes and bosses
  • A soon to be comming multiplater mode (currently on the GX games version)
  • 13 Skins to choose from 
  • And super engaging gameplay!!

Controls:

  • Left click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Bomb
  • Esc - Pause

A game by Blue Legends

Sound effects from Julhani Junkala

Music from Sketchly Logic and Spring Spring

Spring Spring's boss theme: https://opengameart.org/content/bottomless-pit-man-ost-in-progress

The music and sounds are in the public domain, I hold no ownership over them.

Pebble Character from @I'mZary's Pebble Dash: https://imzary.itch.io/pebbledash
